Package lineFollowerSim

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LFS
    LFS Class is Line Follower Simulator main class that handles: tracking the position and heading of a virtual robot based on user specified target speed and turn rate generating the view of immediate surroundings of a robot reading sensor values from user defined spot and line sensors presentation of an image of the course with cookie crumb trail tracking progress of robot implements interactive marker system allowing storing multiple robot start locations and headings on a course.
    LineSensor
    Create linear array of spot sensors, no public constructor is defined for this class, LFS method createLineSensor() is used instead.
    Sensors
    Single instance of Sensors provides access to both spot and line sensor lists created by LFS for the purpose of iterating over all defined sensors to acquire sensor intensity data from the robots current location and heading on a line following course image.
    SpotSensor
    Create a spot sensor, no public constructor is defined for this class, LFS method createSpotSensor is used instead.
    VP
    Rectangular viewport for Course and Robot views defined in screen absolute coordinates where the origin (0,0) is located at upper-left corner of screen.
